name: HipoSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the switch.”
”Alexa, turn off the dimmer.”
”Alexa, dim the desk lamp.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
HipoSmart Home offers the most comprehensive voice-controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free by just saying, e.g., "Alexa, turn on the light".

Example phrases are:
"Alexa, turn on the switch."
"Alexa, turn off the dimmer."
"Alexa, dim the desk lamp."
"Alexa, set the kitchen light to 20 percent."

To get started simply click the "Enable To Use" button for this skill and log into your HipoSmart account. Then confirm your Hub name you would like to have Alexa control.

HipoSmart Hub and account is required. If you don't have HipoSmart yet, you can contact with us at https://www.hiposmart.com
